code: export var TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN='TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN';export var ADD_ITEM='ADD_ITEM';export var CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART='CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART';export var REMOVE_ITEM='REMOVE_ITEM';export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};
